Name: Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII Collector's Edition
Overview:
As Lightning, it is your mission to save as many souls as possible so that they may be brought to the new world. Along the journey, you will encounter familiar faces and engage new foes in all new lands. You must ultimately choose which souls to save and which to abandon...and fully understand Lightning's true destiny. It all ends here.
Collector's Edition contains:
-Premium packaging featuring artwork from the Japan release 
-80 page harcover artbook cantaining Tetsuya Nomura's original sketches of Lightning and concept art from from Lightning returns 
-Silver embossed pocket watch 
-DLC code for FINAL FANTASY 7's Aerith "Midgar's Flower Girl" outfit 
-Game disc
